wikipedia_page.main: Sydney James 'Syd' Thompson (born 1912) is a former Irish international lawn and indoor bowler.

link_mentions.page: Lawn bowls at the 1970 British Commonwealth Games
List of Commonwealth Games medallists in lawn bowls
response: |1970||Norman KingPeter Line||Bob McDonaldRobbie Robson||Jimmy DonnellySyd Thompson
He represented Northern Ireland at three Commonwealth Games and his best achievement was winning a bronze medal in the pairs at the 1970 British Commonwealth Games in Edinburgh with Syd Thompson.
